Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Every time an object is altered, a revision is added to it, which allows teams the ability to track down faulty modifications (usually with the intent of educating the fault-maker) or to simply know who wrote what when/where.\\r\\n"

"+revisions the blue horse\\r\\n Will display a revisions table on the modifications made on the blue horse in your current environment.\\r\\n\\r\\n+revisions \\"Marrach:players:K:kalle\\"\\r\\n Will display a revisions table on the modifications made to the object Marrach:players:K:kalle."
